items.sentence: Do you want to know my first impression of Tom?
I want to buy a newspaper to read on the train.
I want to dedicate all my time to this project.
Tom almost forgot to take an umbrella with him.
Tom and I always speak to each other in French.
Tom and I have been friends since grade school.
Tom and Mary are fighting. Please do something.
Tom and Mary are sitting together on the couch.
Tom didn\'t understand anything we were saying.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to call him all the time.
